law.catch_line: Agreement For Fire Protection Of Commonwealth's Institutions
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] The commissioner of administration is hereby authorized on behalf of the commonwealth to enter into agreements for fire protection with municipalities adjacent to cities and towns in which institutions of the various departments of the commonwealth are located when such agreement is deemed necessary by said commissioner. Chapter 7: Agreement for fire protection of commonwealth's institutions [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 165, Secs. 47 and 48 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] The secretary may on behalf of the commonwealth enter into agreements for fire protection with municipalities adjacent to cities and towns in which institutions of the various departments of the commonwealth are located when such agreement is deemed necessary by the secretary.
